Applicant : Plew, Jonas
School (district) : Columbia High School  (Nampa School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I previously worked as an intern for the Nampa School District's information technology department where I helped with re-imaging devices, adding/updating/renaming devices in Active Directory, installation of ViewSonics/ projectors/ Unite systems, and helped with some cable management/ installation. Additionally, I worked with the project management team for reformatting district policies, onboarding new employees, and overseeing student internships. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to gain some additional work experience as a programmer or cybersecurity/ networking professional. I started teaching while I was still in school pursuing my bachelors degree in cyber operations and resilience. I believe that work experience will greatly improve my ability to teach my current career and technical programs. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Remote
	* Hybrid
	* In-Person

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)

	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)

Business software & skills:
	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Project Management	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I previously worked as an intern for the Nampa School District's information technology department where I helped with re-imaging devices, adding/updating/renaming devices in Active Directory, installation of ViewSonics/ projectors/ Unite systems, and helped with some cable management/ installation. Additionally, I worked with the project management team for reformatting district policies, onboarding new employees, and overseeing student internships. 

LOGISTICS
Residence : Nampa 
Open to:
	* Remote	* Hybrid	* In-Person	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : jplew@nsd131.org
	* Secondary Email : j.plewski05@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2089650798
	* Communication & Availability : 9am-5pm
Applicant : Plew, Jonas
School (district) : Columbia High School  (Nampa School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonas-plew-002600243/

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to gain some additional work experience as a programmer or cybersecurity/ networking professional. I started teaching while I was still in school pursuing my bachelors degree in cyber operations and resilience. I believe that work experience will greatly improve my ability to teach my current career and technical programs. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)

Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I previously worked as an intern for the Nampa School District's information technology department where I helped with re-imaging devices, adding/updating/renaming devices in Active Directory, installation of ViewSonics/ projectors/ Unite systems, and helped with some cable management/ installation. Additionally, I worked with the project management team for reformatting district policies, onboarding new employees, and overseeing student internships. 

LOGISTICS
Residence : Nampa 
Open to:
	* Remote	* Hybrid	* In-Person	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : jplew@nsd131.org
	* Secondary Email : j.plewski05@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2089650798
	* Communication & Availability : 9am-5pm
Applicant : Plew, Jonas
School (district) : Columbia High School  (Nampa School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonas-plew-002600243/

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to gain some additional work experience as a programmer or cybersecurity/ networking professional. I started teaching while I was still in school pursuing my bachelors degree in cyber operations and resilience. I believe that work experience will greatly improve my ability to teach my current career and technical programs. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)

Other interesting experience:
I previously worked as an intern for the Nampa School District's information technology department where I helped with re-imaging devices, adding/updating/renaming devices in Active Directory, installation of ViewSonics/ projectors/ Unite systems, and helped with some cable management/ installation. Additionally, I worked with the project management team for reformatting district policies, onboarding new employees, and overseeing student internships. 

LOGISTICS
Residence : Nampa 
Open to:
	* Remote	* Hybrid	* In-Person	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : jplew@nsd131.org
	* Secondary Email : j.plewski05@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2089650798
	* Communication & Availability : 9am-5pm
Applicant : Plew, Jonas
School (district) : Columbia High School  (Nampa School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonas-plew-002600243/

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to gain some additional work experience as a programmer or cybersecurity/ networking professional. I started teaching while I was still in school pursuing my bachelors degree in cyber operations and resilience. I believe that work experience will greatly improve my ability to teach my current career and technical programs. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)
